titles.title: Blessed Be The God and Father (I Peter 1:3)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blessed be the God and Father, Of our Lord Jesus Christ, Who according to His great mercy, Has caused us to be born again,{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To a living hope through His Resurrection from the dead. All praise to our God and Father For salvation through Jesus Christ.{/lang-eng}
